name: scss-variables-completion
description: Provides autocompletion, diagnostics, and hover info for SCSS variables from a JSON design system file, with deep workspace scanning

scssVariables.path.description: Relative path to the JSON file containing SCSS variable definitions

scssVariables.logLevel.description: Logging verbosity level for the extension

scssVariables.excludedFolders.description: Folders to exclude when scanning the workspace for SCSS files

scssVariables.excludedVariablePatterns.description: Patterns to exclude variables from completions. Can be plain strings or regex patterns enclosed in /, e.g. ["prefix-", "/^_internal_.*/"]

scssVariables.scanPaths.description: Specific paths or glob patterns to scan for SCSS files (e.g., ['src/styles', 'components/**/*.scss']). Empty means scan all.

scssVariables.maxScanDepth.description: Maximum folder depth to scan for SCSS files (e.g., 30 levels deep)

scssVariables.debounceInterval.description: Debounce interval in milliseconds for workspace scanning after file changes

scssVariables.enableDiagnostics.description: Enable diagnostics for undefined variables, unsupported properties, and unused JSON variables

scssVariables.showLocalVariableNotificat.description: Enable notifications for new local variables not defined in the JSON file

scssVariables.showScanProgress.description: Show progress notifications during workspace scans

scssVariables.enableHtmlSupport.description: Enable integration with CSS custom properties in HTML files

scssVariables.enableInterpolatedVariable.description: Enable support for interpolated variable names like #{$variable-name}

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
